summary: Updating API key and base URL, enabling better exceptions, then running the script.

details.comment: Updating API key and base URL, enabling better exceptions, then running the script.
details.content:
export OPENAI_API_KEY='any'
export OPENAI_API_BASE=http://0.0.0.0:8000
export BETTER_EXCEPTIONS=1
python3 remove_unwanted_notes.py
